description:

## Genesis STAGEHOLDER ![STAGEHOLDERS](https://cdn.stageholders.net/soonaverse/awards/Genesis_STAGEHOLDER.png "STAGEHOLDERS")

### Conditions 

You can apply for this award **ONLY** by providing a **Contextual Identity** you generate from your account on *STAGEHOLDERS.net*.

[Click here for more details on how to apply!](https://stageholders.net/directions/soonaverse-stageholder)


### Allocation

This is awarded **only** to the "Genesis Group" users from STAGEHOLDERS.net, on a first come, first served manner, based on the Contextual Identity you create for this pupose. 

There is a maximum of 2,500 Awards available.

### Benefits
- 4 XP on SOONAVERSE
- 4 $BackSTAGE Tokens from STAGEHOLDERS project
- 400 $STAGE Tokens from STAGEHOLDERS project 
- free valuable NFT dedicated to this category (to be announced soon)
- exclusive series distributed from NFT Collection (to be announced soon)
- discount on NFT sales (to be announced soon)
- 1+4 increased vote power on the STAGEHOLDERS Proposals
- exclusive token distribution from other projects on STAGEHOLDERS platform

### Support

If you need help please contact us at: contact@stageholders.net
name: Genesis STAGEHOLDER
